comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Yes, rjones, the photo does appear to be out of sequence, as it has nothing to do with Puerto Rico.  It is part of another group of images of Greene County, Georgia, taken by Jack Delano.  I'm just not sure if the numbering inconsistency indicates a problem, or missing image, but will look into it.
